title: El Camino Real de Tierra Adentro National Historic Trail: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        NPS Centennial - Celebrate the 100th birthday of the National Park Service! Join us with programs, experiences, and events across the nation.    Partners -  Check out how we partner with tribes, individuals, organizations, and federal, local, and state agencies to manage the trail and provide excellent experiences for visitors.     Work with Us - See what paid or volunteer opportunities exist.      Planning - Stay up to date and get involved with trail planning efforts.   Support Your Park - See how you can have an active role in preserving and sharing the legacy of the trail.
